languages.text: {n}Слова провидицы заставляют {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}нечто темное и пугающее{/d} всплыть из глубин вашей памяти. Ваша душа осталась запятнанной влиянием варп-колдовства — похоже, вам никогда не избавиться от этой отметины навсегда.{/n}

{n}The seer's words dredge up {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}something dark and frightening{/d} from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слова провидицы заставляют {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}нечто темное и пугающее{/d} всплыть из глубин вашей памяти. Ваша душа осталась запятнанной влиянием варп-колдовства — похоже, вам никогда не избавиться от этой отметины навсегда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The seer's words dredge up something dark and frightening from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}
{n}The seer's words dredge up something dark and frightening from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}
{n}The seer's words dredge up something dark and frightening from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}
{n}The seer's words dredge up something dark and frightening from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前这位先知的话，勾起了你记忆深处{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}某些阴暗、可怕的东西{/d}。你的灵魂遭到了亚空间巫术的玷污，恐怕永远都无法摆脱它的影响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words dredge up {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}something dark and frightening{/d} from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前这位先知的话，勾起了你记忆深处某些阴暗、可怕的东西。你的灵魂遭到了亚空间巫术的玷污，恐怕永远都无法摆脱它的影响。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las palabras de la vidente sacan a la superficie {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}algo oscuro y terrible{/d} desde las profundidades de tu mente. Tu alma está mancillada por el influjo de la hechicería de la disformidad y parece que nunca te librarás de esta mancha.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words dredge up {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}something dark and frightening{/d} from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras de la vidente sacan a la superficie algo oscuro y terrible desde las profundidades de tu mente. Tu alma está mancillada por el influjo de la hechicería de la disformidad y parece que nunca te librarás de esta mancha.{/n}

languages.text: {n}予見者の言葉は、あなたの記憶の奥底から{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}暗く恐ろしい何か{/d}を掘り起こした。魂は<歪み>の魔術の影響によって穢れており、それは決して取り除くことができないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words dredge up {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}something dark and frightening{/d} from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}予見者の言葉は、あなたの記憶の奥底から暗く恐ろしい何かを掘り起こした。あなたの魂は<歪み>の魔術の影響によって穢れており、それは決して取り除くことができないようだ。{/n}
{n}予見者の言葉は、あなたの記憶の奥底から{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}暗く恐ろしい何か{/d}を掘り起こした。魂は<歪み>の魔術の影響によって穢れており、それは決して取り除くことができないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les paroles de la prophétesse font remonter quelque chose d'enfoui dans les profondeurs de votre mémoire, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}quelque chose de sombre et d'effrayant{/d}. Votre âme a été souillée par la sorcellerie du Warp et rien ne pourra jamais l'en débarrasser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words dredge up {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}something dark and frightening{/d} from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les paroles de la prophétesse font remonter quelque chose d'enfoui dans les profondeurs de votre mémoire, quelque chose de sombre et d'effrayant. Votre âme a été souillée par la sorcellerie du Warp et rien ne pourra jamais l'en débarrasser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Worte der Seherin zerren {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}etwas Dunkles und Verängstigendes{/d} aus den Tiefen deiner Erinnerungen hervor. Deine Seele wurde vom Einfluss der Warphexerei vergiftet, und es scheint, als würdest du ihn nie wieder abschütteln können.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words dredge up {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}something dark and frightening{/d} from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Worte der Seherin zerren etwas Dunkles und Verängstigendes aus den Tiefen deiner Erinnerungen hervor. Deine Seele wurde vom Einfluss der Warphexerei vergiftet, und es scheint, als würdest du ihn nie wieder abschütteln können.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Medyumun sözleri, anılarının derinliklerinden {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}karanlık ve ürkütücü bir şeyleri{/d} eşeleyip çıkarıyor. Ruhun öteboyut sahirliğinin etkisiyle lekelenmiş. Belli ki ne yaparsan yap o lekeden arınamayacaksın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The seer's words dredge up {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}something dark and frightening{/d} from the depths of your memory. Your soul has been tainted by the influence of warp sorcery, and it seems you will never be rid of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Medyumun sözleri, anılarının derinliklerinden karanlık ve ürkütücü bir şeyleri eşeleyip çıkarıyor. Ruhun öteboyut sahirliğinin etkisiyle lekelenmiş. Belli ki ne yaparsan yap o lekeden arınamayacaksın.{/n}
